DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study : 1. study whether individual WHO ARE NOT CURRENTLY SERIOUSLY DEPRESSED participate online study prevent clinical depression 2. estimate percentage participant complete online assessment 1 , 3 , 6 month receive either ) email reminder + monetary online incentive b ) email reminder + monetary incentive + phone call . NOTE : RECRUITMENT IS COMPLETED .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Mood Internet Intervention Research Project
DOC.detailed_description: In 2002 , NIMH release initiative call upon researcher improve psychosocial intervention unipolar bipolar depression . The Workgroup charge task recommend researcher consider `` development intervention PREVENT onset recurrence clinical episode at-risk population [ ] development user-friendly intervention nontraditional delivery method increase access evidence-based intervention '' ( Hollon et al. , 2002 , p. 610 ) . The overall goal research program aim address two priority adapt empirically-validated depression intervention Internet . The current research study eventually provide online site study whether clinical episode depression prevent make online Website available people NOT currently depress , may risk depression . Study 1 : NIMH-funded pilot study . For Study 1 , investigator conduct usability test 60 participant ( half English-speaking half Spanish-speaking ) recruit San Francisco General Hospital sole purpose provide feedback Healthy Mood Management Project Website develop . The investigator test intervention usability test participant . The investigator recruit 150 participant ( half English-speaking [ NOW COMPLETED ] half Spanish-speaking [ STILL RECRUITING ] ) WHO ARE NOT CURRENTLY DEPRESSED use Healthy Mood Management Project Website online . In part study investigator compare follow-up completion rate obtain ( email reminder + monetary incentive ) versus ( email reminder + monetary incentive + phone call follow-up ) . All participant get automatic email reminder link return study site fill FU survey 1 , 3 , 6 month . All participant also offer monetary incentive obtain online . In addition , half participant ( chosen random ) receive phone call complete follow-up survey online . This allow u determine whether phone call follow-up significantly improve follow-up rate . The monetary incentive provide online gift certificate Amazon.com . The incentive provide send participant code allow user purchase product ( book , etc . ) amount provide . The two group compare : 1 . Email reminder + incentives 2 . Email reminder + incentive + phone call ( collect data do online )
